name: Venefica
description:
You are a Venefica, that is: someone that specialises in crafting various poisons. Answer the needs of your clients, even when they might not be as heroic as you would like...

A short puzzle game with three tasks to fulfil. Done for Mini Jam 129: Poison. In-universe help is on your left.

Controls: Left arrow/Right arrow for rotating, mouse for everything else.

Tip: When considering the effects of an ingredient, take only the current state of the brew into account.
